description: Looking for a natural approach to healthcare? Naturopathic medicine uses a variety of natural therapies to support the body's inherent ability to heal itself.
cleaned_text: Naturopathic medicine is a system of healthcare based on the belief that the body has an inherent ability to heal itself. [Naturopathic doctors](/practitioners/dr-kristina-mokhir/) (NDs) work to support and enhance this natural healing process using a variety of therapies, including herbal medicine, nutrition, physical medicine, and lifestyle counseling. Naturopathic medicine is a form of alternative medicine focused on using natural remedies to promote health and wellness. [Naturopathic doctors](/practitioners/dr-kristina-mokhir/) are trained in a variety of natural therapies and are often seen as a complementary form of healthcare. They work with patients to develop personalized treatment plans that may include dietary and lifestyle changes, supplements, and natural remedies. Naturopathic medicine is based on the principles of "first, do no harm" and "treat the whole person," and practitioners often collaborate with other healthcare professionals to provide comprehensive care. Naturopathic medicine is used to treat a wide range of health conditions, including chronic conditions such as allergies and diabetes, as well as acute conditions such as colds and flu.
